recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.ingredients: Spaghetti, Eggs, Parmesan Cheese, Pancetta, Black Pepper
recipes.instructions: 1. Cook spaghetti. 2. Fry pancetta. 3. Mix eggs and cheese. 4. Combine everything.

recipes.title: Chicken Curry
recipes.ingredients: Chicken, Curry Powder, Coconut Milk, Onions, Garlic, Ginger
recipes.instructions: 1. Saut√© onions, garlic, and ginger. 2. Add chicken and curry powder. 3. Pour coconut milk and simmer.

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipes.ingredients: Broccoli, Carrots, Bell Peppers, Soy Sauce, Garlic, Ginger
recipes.instructions: 1. Heat oil in a pan. 2. Add garlic and ginger. 3. Stir-fry vegetables and add soy sauce.

recipes.title: Pancakes
recipes.ingredients: Flour, Eggs, Milk, Baking Powder, Sugar, Butter
recipes.instructions: 1. Mix dry and wet ingredients separately. 2. Combine and whisk. 3. Cook on a pan until golden brown.

recipes.title: Grilled Salmon
recipes.ingredients: Salmon, Olive Oil, Lemon, Garlic, Salt, Pepper
recipes.instructions: 1. Marinate salmon with olive oil, lemon, garlic, salt, and pepper. 2. Grill for 4-5 minutes on each side.
